import './App.css'; import './index.css'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import LoginPage from './pages/LoginPage'; // Import the LoginPage function App() { const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); // List of Smart Home products const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Smart Doorbell', description: 'Monitor and interact with your visitors remotely with HD video and two-way communication.', price: 99.99, image: 'smart-doorbell.jpg', // Ensure you have images in your public folder }, { id: 2, name: 'Smart Doorlock', description: 'Secure your home with advanced keyless entry, including remote locking and unlocking.', price: 149.99, image: 'smart-doorlock.jpg', }, { id: 3, name: 'Smart Speaker', description: 'Control your home with voice commands, listen to music, and connect with other devices.', price: 89.99, image: 'smart-speaker.jpg', }, { id: 4, name: 'Smart Lighting', description: 'Automate your home lighting with remote controls and custom schedules.', price: 49.99, image: 'smart-lighting.jpg', }, { id: 5, name: 'Smart Thermostat', description: 'Manage your homeâ€™s temperature efficiently to save on energy costs.', price: 199.99, image: 'smart-thermostat.jpg', }, ]; // Function to toggle dropdown visibility const toggleDropdown = () => { setShowDropdown((prevState) => !prevState); }; return (

Welcome to SmartHomes

At SmartHomes, we provide cutting-edge smart home solutions that make everyday living easier and more secure. Explore our range of products, from smart doorbells to thermostats, all designed to seamlessly integrate into your home and provide remote control, automation, and convenience. Our smart appliances use the latest technology to ensure your home is both energy-efficient and secure.

Whether you're looking to monitor your home while away, automate your lighting, or reduce energy costs, SmartHomes has the perfect solution for you.

Learn More
